definition: suffix of a noun of locality
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: I came across this heavily armed Iraqi border guard.
sentences.chinese: 我碰到這個全副武裝的伊拉克邊防軍士兵。

sentences.english: The Russia media said, the ship sank after Russian border guards' firing.
sentences.chinese: 俄媒稱，這艘船沉沒前遭到了俄邊防軍的開火。
